pages.text: Bungartius is relatively large-sized placoderm known from Devonian Cleveland Shale, same locality that have famous Dunkleosteus and Cladoselache. It is characterized by having scissor-like shaped plate which used as tooth. Using that, it was probably able to crush not only common prey like fish, but also hard-shelled animals.
